# Test Fixtures - Invalid Inputs
# Each line represents an invalid input that should be rejected
# Format: <input> # <reason>

0abc        # Contains invalid '0' (zero)
Oabc        # Contains invalid 'O' (capital O)
Iabc        # Contains invalid 'I' (capital I)
labc        # Contains invalid 'l' (lowercase L)
            # Empty line
   abc      # Leading whitespace
abc         # Trailing whitespace
abc def     # Space in middle
0OIl        # All invalid Base58 characters
test0       # Zero at end
testO       # Capital O at end
testI       # Capital I at end
testl       # Lowercase L at end
0test       # Zero at start
Otest       # Capital O at start
Itest       # Capital I at start
ltest       # Lowercase L at start
a0b         # Zero in middle
aOb         # Capital O in middle
aIb         # Capital I in middle
alb         # Lowercase L in middle
